description: Micropub is an emerging open API standard that is used to create posts on your own domain using third-party apps. Web apps and mobile apps can use Micropub to post notes, photos, bookmarks and many other kinds of posts to your own website, similar to using a Twitter client to post to your Twitter account.
title: OSB 2015 - Micropub: The Emerging API Standard for IndieWeb Apps - Aaron Parecki
